snippet: Officers Tyrane Issac and David Afanador also face misconduct charges in the arrest of Kaheem Tribble, 16, in Brooklyn.
abstract: Brooklyn police officers Tyrane Isaac and David Afanador are charged with assault and misconduct in the arrest of teenager Kaheem Tribble; surveillance video shows officers brutally attacking Tribble after he had surrendered during pursuit.
lead_paragraph: Officers Tyrane Issac and David Afanador also face misconduct charges in the arrest of Kaheem Tribble, 16, in Brooklyn.

headline.main: 2 New York City Officers Charged With Assaulting Teenager
